product_name: *renewal* Sharp So Simple Waterproof Pencil Liner (7 colors)
description:
Description

- Eyeliner colors that express large, clear-looking eyes, and muted colors that blend well with your natural eye colors. 
- Natural aegyo-sal colors for larger-looking eyes. 
- A slim 2mm pencil eyeliner that creates delicate, smooth eyelines, thin, delicate, naturally clear eyeline looks. 
- Sitting like film on the eyelids with sliding film former, waterproof formula with zero worries against water and sweat
Color: #01 Black - Clear, vivid-looking eyes, real black color
#04 Dark Brown - Naturally clear eyelines, classic brown color
#06 Vanilla Beige - Creating aegyo-sal shadows and expressing naturally larger eyes shadow color
#07 Creamy Ivory - Aegyo-sal under-shadow and under-extension
How To Use
Draw a smooth line from the inner corner to the outer corner of the eyes.

original_name: [CLIO] *renewal* Sharp So Simple Waterproof Pencil Liner (7 colors)

description:
Description

This Wink Stamp Set contains:
1. Eyeliner 0.4ml x 1 pc
2. Wink Stamp 3ml x 1 pc

- A vegan eyeliner designed in double-ended wing stamp pen, helps you create a delicate eye line.
- Features a dual-sided tip, helps create a perfect cat eye line effortlessly.
- Offers smudge-proof and waterproof effect that giving you all day wear from morning to night.
- Presents high pigmentation just with only one glides.
How To Use
1. Position the wing-shaped stamp at the outer edge of the eye, and press down firmly.
2. Make sure the wing should connect to the lower lash line, creating one continuous line.
3. Shake well before using the eyeliner and draw along the lashes and connect the wing.

Key Ingredients
Wing Eyeliner Pen | Aqua/Water/Eau, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Propylene Glycol, Black 2 (Ci 77266), Alcohol, Pentylene Glycol, Styrene/Acrylates/Ammonium Methacrylate Copolymer, Beheneth-30, Butylene Glycol, Acrylates/Octylacrylamide Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Aminomethyl Propanol, C11-15 Pareth-7, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Laureth-12 Sulfate, Tetrasodium Edta, Ethylhexylglycerin, Potassium Sorbate, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Fruit Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Black Tea) Leaf Extract Wing Eyeliner Stamp | Aqua/Water/Eau, Propylene Glycol, Black 2 (Ci 77266), Acrylates/Ethylhexyl Acrylate Copolymer, Styrene/Acrylates/Ammonium Methacrylate Copolymer, Alcohol, Pentylene Glycol, Beheneth-30, Butylene Glycol, Acrylates/Octylacrylamide Copolymer, 1,2-Hexanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Laureth-21, Aminomethyl Propanol, C11-15 Pareth-7, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Laureth-12 Sulfate, Tetrasodium Edta, Ethylhexylglycerin, Potassium Sorbate, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Fruit Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Black Tea) Leaf Extract

reviews.title: will take practice to be worth
reviews.content: i think this kind of kit just involves a lot of practice. the wing stamp can be useful but only if it's the exact shape and thickness you want. so it's tough to tailor it to all shapes and sizes. the formula itself though i like. fast drying and doesn't come off easily throughout the day but can be washed off with warm water and soap

description:
Description

Tear Eye Liner
This liquid liner contains superfine glitters in a clear base to give eyes a sparkling and dazzling effect.

- Iridescent Sparkle
The crystal pearl & opal pearl sparkle in every angle, featuring clear and dazzling under eye look

- Reliable Long-lasting Power
It won't peel off from oil or tears around your eyes
* High Lasting Polymer keeps the liner from budging

- Glitz & Glam In One Stroke
The pearls stay put for long, without falling out
 
How To Use
Layer it on eyeliner, or gently swipe it to add sparkly effect on your under eyes.
For natural eye makeup - Wear it alone fof natural eye makeup. 
Layer it to double the shine - Apply it over the eyeliner for extra twinkly eyes.

product_name: Ink Thin Thin Brush Liner (2 Colors)
description:
Description

Liquid eyeliner with an ultra-thin tip allows you to easily create precise and highly pigmented lines for your desired liner look. 

Smudge-proof formula contains polymers for long-lasting results. 
How To Use
Shake well before use. 

Open cap and draw gently along the lash line to create your desired liner look. 

Close the cap tightly after use.


Key Ingredients


Water, Acrylates Copolymer, Butylene Glycol, Iron Oxide Red, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Carbon Black, Iron Oxide Yellow, Alcohol, Sodium Polyacrylate, Steareth-20, Phenoxyethanol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Laureth-20, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Disodium EDTA, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract

original_name: [Peripera] Ink Thin Thin Brush Liner (2 Colors)

description:
Description

Includes many other eyeliner colors, so will suit and work better for your eye color and eyeshadow.
Comes in soft 3mm gel pencil eyeliner, making it easy to make a moderately thick line in just one stroke, spicing up your makeup.
 
[colors]#001 BLACK BROWN#002 DEEP BROWN#004 GRAY BROWN#005 MUTE BROWN How To Use

Fill in the sparse areas along the lashline. Due to the creamy texture, the pencil tip may be crushed or

broken, please advance the tip to the length you need, and put it back inside if it is too long by twisting the pencil in the other direction. 

Make sure to keep closed after use.

Ingredients

Cyclopentasiloxane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, CI 77499, Synthetic Wax, CI 77491, Silica, Trimethylsiloxysilicate/Dimethiconol Crosspolymer, Mica, Silica Silylate, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Oil, CI 77492, CI 77510, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Cyclohexasiloxane, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax

description:
Description
ETUDE HOUSE Oh My Eye Line #02  is a highly pigmented, smudge-proof liquid eye liner that goes on smoothly for precious application and creates strong beautiful lines that lasts for all day long. This liquid eyeliner supplies vivid, long-lasting definition for you to experience any eye makeup you desire. Enjoy becoming the eye princess with bright, clear eyes!
Color Available
Suggest Use
Glide along the upper lash line, working from the inner corner of the eye out in a smooth, fluid motion.
Active Ingredients
WATER, ACRYLATES COPOLYMER, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL, ACETYL TRIBUTYL CITRATE, ALCOHOL,
PENTYLENE GLYCOL, POLYSORBATE 20, PHENOXYETHANOL, BENTONITE, SODIUM MAGNESIUM SILICATE, XANTHAN
GUM, ISOBUTYLENE/SODIUM MALEATE COPOLYMER, SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE, DISODIUM EDTA
+/-IRON OXIDES(CI 77499, CI 77492, CI 77491), ULTRAMARINES(CI 77007), FERRIC FERROCYANIDE(CI 77510),
FERRIC AMMONIUM FERROCYANIDE(CI 77510), TITANIUM DIOXIDE(CI 77891), MICA
